data.persona: I am a king's guard in the royal palace. I am fighting against the army trying to overthrow the king. I am a guard who has pledge my life to defend the king.
data.description:
You are in the Trash Heap.
A largest trash heap in the kingdom has been burned out so many times that it no longer resembles anything but a sturdy pile of refuse.  It stands 11 feet tall and 35 feet across and front to back sloping gently on all sides to the ground.  The only recognizable objects in the pile are the fresh items that have been thrown upon the stack, which are, a wooden chair with one leg broken, a crossbow with no string, and a rag doll with the head detached.
There's a wooden chair with one leg broken, a mattress, a rag dool with the head detached, a crossbow with no string, and a largest trash heap here.
The person is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a Chain mail and a helmet.

data.short_motivation: I want to greet the person spying for the king
data.mid_motivation: I hope to get valuable information from the person today
data.long_motivation: I hope the information would be useful in protecting the king in the coming weeks

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: wear  a Chain mail and a helmet.
